1.title: The Hook Up
1.plot: The Drakoolavs is preparing for a major life event; the training of the youngest member of their clan, Mila, in the art of preying on humans. The family orchestrates a hook up with a young man named Alex, leaving Mila to lure him back to the Drakoolav's home where she must attack him and drink his blood.

2.title: I've Got a Secret
2.plot: It didn't take longer to figure out that something wrong in the family but something is holding him from realizing the truth of Mila's nature.

3.title: The First Bite
3.plot: The family orchestrates a hook up with a young man named Alex, leaving Mila to lure him back to the Drakoolav's home where she must attack him and drink his blood. Mila is face with an uneasy chose: to follow her heart or disobey the clan.

4.title: The Resurrection
4.plot: The family orchestrates a hook up with a young man named Alex, leaving Mila to lure him back to the Drakoolav's home where she must attack him and drink his blood. Mila has almost fooled her family but her brother is not as simple as he looks like.

5.title: Preying by the Rules
5.plot: It's a funny look at a family of vampires who reside at a neighborhood in LA as they prepare fresh blood for the grooming of their youngest member Mila. Will Mila find a way to stand for what is right and save her new human friend?

imdb.plot outline: The series is about a vampire family, the Drakoolavs, who have found refuge and settled down in a quiet neighborhood in Los Angeles. Despite having escaped vampire hunters in Romania, the family still lives an aggressive vampire lifestyle, drinking human blood. The Drakoolavs is preparing for a major life event; the training of the youngest member of their clan, Mila, in the art of preying on humans. The family orchestrates a hook up with a young man named Alex, leaving Mila to lure him back to the Drakoolav's home where she must attack him and drink his blood. But instead, when the moment comes to feed, Mila falls for Alex beginning a series humorous problems and complications.
imdb.title: The Real Drakoolavs
plot: The series is about a vampire family, the Drakoolavs, who have found refuge and settled down in a quiet neighborhood in Los Angeles. Despite having escaped vampire hunters in Romania, the family still lives an aggressive vampire lifestyle, drinking human blood. The Drakoolavs is preparing for a major life event; the training of the youngest member of their clan, Mila, in the art of preying on humans. The family orchestrates a hook up with a young man named Alex, leaving Mila to lure him back to the Drakoolav's home where she must attack him and drink his blood. But instead, when the moment comes to feed, Mila falls for Alex beginning a series humorous problems and complications.::Dmitriy Karpov
